attributes.action: there should be more provisions for young people
attributes.additional_details:
We want to engage young people and get them involved doing something on a regular basis. To do this we need provisions and facilities in place for young people and more youth activities run in the community.

we also want to facilitate young people to get engaged with the problems faced by their communities and create change for the better.this would help tackle prominent issues in the community. incentives should be in place to encourage the change mentality.

to sum up:
more provisions need to be in place
more facilities to raise and solve awareness in the community
more incentives to get young people engaged
